A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fans\, I enjoyed the movie.  The story was well done and the pace was also good.  At the start\, I was concerned that some of the humor would linger however the story quickly moved along.  I like the way the film expanded the powers of the Force for the audience.  In some ways it clarified the extent of powers that had been demonstrated in prior films.
